text: Petre Dumitru (born 11 November 1957) is a retired Romanian weightlifter. He competed at the 1980 and 1984 Olympics and won a silver medal in 1984. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic weightlifters of Romania Category:Weightlifters at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Weightlifters at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic silver medalists for Romania Category:Olympic medalists in weightlifting Category:Medalists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Romanian male weightlifters
title: Petre Dumitru
